extDesc.message: In the background, control the video with keyboard shortcuts: toggle picture-in-picture, play/pause, skip forward, skip backward, speed up, and slow down

clickToSwitch.description: The text of the button to switch PiP

secs.description: The text after the number input for seconds

skipBackwardBy.description: The text before the number input for skip backward by

skipForwardBy.description: The text before the number input for skip forward by
